title: Experience Grand Hyatt Luxury in Midtown Manhattan
description: Treat yourself to elevated luxury above Manhattan's pulsing avenues and watch the vibrant streets of the world’s liveliest city with a luxury stay in the heart of New York City’s Midtown-a stone’s throw from the city’s best attractions and Time Square. Only a few minutes’ walk from the luxury boutiques of Fifth Avenue, luxe apartment blocks of Park Avenue, stunning Central Park, unique ceiling mural of Grand Central Station and so much more, you’ll enjoy a seven or nine-night stay with daily food credit to share, two cocktails to share, an audio tour of Grand Central Station, unlimited international phone calls and more as you discover the incredible art, culture and gastronomy that New York has to offer.
offer_address: 109 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA
